definition: To arrange and furnish a space with various items, such as furniture, decor, and other objects, in order to make it functional and aesthetically pleasing. This term is commonly used when referring to the process of setting up or decorating a room, apartment, or house.

examples.english: I want to furnish my living room.

examples.german: Wir haben gerade unsere Wohnung möbliert.
Er hat das Büro mit neuen Möbeln möbliert.
examples.english: He furnished the office with new furniture.
The vacation rental is fully furnished.

examples.german: Sie hat das Zimmer mit antiken Möbeln möbliert.
examples.english: She furnished the room with antique furniture.
